titleStmt.title: A disputation: whether Elijah, in Malachi 4. be any other prophet than what hath already been in the world? By Thomas Moor' author of the Clavis Aurea.
titleStmt.author: Moor, Thomas, fl. 1695-1697.

notesStmt.note: Copy tightly bound with loss of text.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
